00033 namespace glm

00035         template <typename T, precision P>
00036         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> translate
00037         (
00038                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m,
00039                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v
00040         )
00041         {
00042                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result(m);
00043                 Result[3] = m[0] * v[0] + m[1] * v[1] + m[2] * v[2] + m[3];
00044                 return Result;
00045         }
00046         
00047         template <typename T, precision P>
00048         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> rotate
00049         (
00050                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m,
00051                 T const & angle,
00052                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v
00053         )
00054         {
00055 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00056                 T a = angle;
00057 #else
00058 #               pragma message("GLM: rotate function taking degrees as a parameter is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00059                 T a = radians(angle);
00060 #endif
00061                 T c = cos(a);
00062                 T s = sin(a);
00063 
00064                 detail::tvec3<T, P> axis(normalize(v));
00065                 detail::tvec3<T, P> temp((T(1) - c) * axis);
00066 
00067                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Rotate(detail::tmat4x4<T, P>::_null);
00068                 Rotate[0][0] = c + temp[0] * axis[0];
00069                 Rotate[0][1] = 0 + temp[0] * axis[1] + s * axis[2];
00070                 Rotate[0][2] = 0 + temp[0] * axis[2] - s * axis[1];
00071 
00072                 Rotate[1][0] = 0 + temp[1] * axis[0] - s * axis[2];
00073                 Rotate[1][1] = c + temp[1] * axis[1];
00074                 Rotate[1][2] = 0 + temp[1] * axis[2] + s * axis[0];
00075 
00076                 Rotate[2][0] = 0 + temp[2] * axis[0] + s * axis[1];
00077                 Rotate[2][1] = 0 + temp[2] * axis[1] - s * axis[0];
00078                 Rotate[2][2] = c + temp[2] * axis[2];
00079 
00080                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result(detail::tmat4x4<T, P>::_null);
00081                 Result[0] = m[0] * Rotate[0][0] + m[1] * Rotate[0][1] + m[2] * Rotate[0][2];
00082                 Result[1] = m[0] * Rotate[1][0] + m[1] * Rotate[1][1] + m[2] * Rotate[1][2];
00083                 Result[2] = m[0] * Rotate[2][0] + m[1] * Rotate[2][1] + m[2] * Rotate[2][2];
00084                 Result[3] = m[3];
00085                 return Result;
00086         }
00087                 
00088         template <typename T, precision P>
00089         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> rotate_slow
00090         (
00091                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m,
00092                 T const & angle, 
00093                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v
00094         )
00095         {
00096 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00097                 T const a = angle;
00098 #else
00099 #               pragma message("GLM: rotate_slow function taking degrees as a parameter is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00100                 T const a = radians(angle);
00101 #endif
00102                 T c = cos(a);
00103                 T s = sin(a);
00104                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result;
00105 
00106                 detail::tvec3<T, P> axis = normalize(v);
00107 
00108                 Result[0][0] = c + (1 - c)      * axis.x     * axis.x;
00109                 Result[0][1] = (1 - c) * axis.x * axis.y + s * axis.z;
00110                 Result[0][2] = (1 - c) * axis.x * axis.z - s * axis.y;
00111                 Result[0][3] = 0;
00112 
00113                 Result[1][0] = (1 - c) * axis.y * axis.x - s * axis.z;
00114                 Result[1][1] = c + (1 - c) * axis.y * axis.y;
00115                 Result[1][2] = (1 - c) * axis.y * axis.z + s * axis.x;
00116                 Result[1][3] = 0;
00117 
00118                 Result[2][0] = (1 - c) * axis.z * axis.x + s * axis.y;
00119                 Result[2][1] = (1 - c) * axis.z * axis.y - s * axis.x;
00120                 Result[2][2] = c + (1 - c) * axis.z * axis.z;
00121                 Result[2][3] = 0;
00122 
00123                 Result[3] = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0, 0, 0, 1);
00124                 return m * Result;
00125         }
00126 
00127         template <typename T, precision P>
00128         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> scale
00129                 (
00130                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m,
00131                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v
00132                 )
00133         {
00134                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result(detail::tmat4x4<T, P>::_null);
00135                 Result[0] = m[0] * v[0];
00136                 Result[1] = m[1] * v[1];
00137                 Result[2] = m[2] * v[2];
00138                 Result[3] = m[3];
00139                 return Result;
00140         }
00141 
00142         template <typename T, precision P>
00143         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> scale_slow
00144         (
00145                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m,
00146                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v
00147         )
00148         {
00149                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result(T(1));
00150                 Result[0][0] = v.x;
00151                 Result[1][1] = v.y;
00152                 Result[2][2] = v.z;
00153                 return m * Result;
00154         }
00155 
00156         template <typename T>
00157         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> ortho
00158         (
00159                 T const & left,
00160                 T const & right,
00161                 T const & bottom,
00162                 T const & top,
00163                 T const & zNear,
00164                 T const & zFar
00165         )
00166         {
00167                 detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> Result(1);
00168                 Result[0][0] = static_cast<T>(2) / (right - left);
00169                 Result[1][1] = static_cast<T>(2) / (top - bottom);
00170                 Result[2][2] = - T(2) / (zFar - zNear);
00171                 Result[3][0] = - (right + left) / (right - left);
00172                 Result[3][1] = - (top + bottom) / (top - bottom);
00173                 Result[3][2] = - (zFar + zNear) / (zFar - zNear);
00174                 return Result;
00175         }
00176 
00177         template <typename T>
00178         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> ortho
00179         (
00180                 T const & left,
00181                 T const & right,
00182                 T const & bottom,
00183                 T const & top
00184         )
00185         {
00186                 detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> Result(1);
00187                 Result[0][0] = static_cast<T>(2) / (right - left);
00188                 Result[1][1] = static_cast<T>(2) / (top - bottom);
00189                 Result[2][2] = - T(1);
00190                 Result[3][0] = - (right + left) / (right - left);
00191                 Result[3][1] = - (top + bottom) / (top - bottom);
00192                 return Result;
00193         }
00194 
00195         template <typename T>
00196         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> frustum
00197         (
00198                 T const & left,
00199                 T const & right,
00200                 T const & bottom,
00201                 T const & top,
00202                 T const & nearVal,
00203                 T const & farVal
00204         )
00205         {
00206                 detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> Result(0);
00207                 Result[0][0] = (static_cast<T>(2) * nearVal) / (right - left);
00208                 Result[1][1] = (static_cast<T>(2) * nearVal) / (top - bottom);
00209                 Result[2][0] = (right + left) / (right - left);
00210                 Result[2][1] = (top + bottom) / (top - bottom);
00211                 Result[2][2] = -(farVal + nearVal) / (farVal - nearVal);
00212                 Result[2][3] = static_cast<T>(-1);
00213                 Result[3][2] = -(static_cast<T>(2) * farVal * nearVal) / (farVal - nearVal);
00214                 return Result;
00215         }
00216 
00217         template <typename T>
00218         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> perspective
00219         (
00220                 T const & fovy,
00221                 T const & aspect,
00222                 T const & zNear,
00223                 T const & zFar
00224         )
00225         {
00226                 assert(aspect != static_cast<T>(0));
00227                 assert(zFar != zNear);
00228 
00229 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00230                 T const rad = fovy;
00231 #else
00232 #               pragma message("GLM: perspective function taking degrees as a parameter is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00233                 T const rad = glm::radians(fovy);
00234 #endif
00235 
00236                 T tanHalfFovy = tan(rad / static_cast<T>(2));
00237 
00238                 detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> Result(static_cast<T>(0));
00239                 Result[0][0] = static_cast<T>(1) / (aspect * tanHalfFovy);
00240                 Result[1][1] = static_cast<T>(1) / (tanHalfFovy);
00241                 Result[2][2] = - (zFar + zNear) / (zFar - zNear);
00242                 Result[2][3] = - static_cast<T>(1);
00243                 Result[3][2] = - (static_cast<T>(2) * zFar * zNear) / (zFar - zNear);
00244                 return Result;
00245         }
00246         
00247         template <typename T>
00248         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> perspectiveFov
00249         (
00250                 T const & fov,
00251                 T const & width,
00252                 T const & height,
00253                 T const & zNear,
00254                 T const & zFar
00255         )
00256         {
00257                 assert(width > static_cast<T>(0));
00258                 assert(height > static_cast<T>(0));
00259                 assert(fov > static_cast<T>(0));
00260         
00261 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00262                 T rad = fov;
00263 #else
00264 #               pragma message("GLM: perspectiveFov function taking degrees as a parameter is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00265                 T rad = glm::radians(fov);
00266 #endif
00267                 T h = glm::cos(static_cast<T>(0.5) * rad) / glm::sin(static_cast<T>(0.5) * rad);
00268                 T w = h * height / width; 
00269 
00270                 detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> Result(static_cast<T>(0));
00271                 Result[0][0] = w;
00272                 Result[1][1] = h;
00273                 Result[2][2] = - (zFar + zNear) / (zFar - zNear);
00274                 Result[2][3] = - static_cast<T>(1);
00275                 Result[3][2] = - (static_cast<T>(2) * zFar * zNear) / (zFar - zNear);
00276                 return Result;
00277         }
00278 
00279         template <typename T>
00280         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> infinitePerspective
00281         (
00282                 T fovy,
00283                 T aspect,
00284                 T zNear
00285         )
00286         {
00287 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00288                 T const range = tan(fovy / T(2)) * zNear;       
00289 #else
00290 #               pragma message("GLM: infinitePerspective function taking degrees as a parameter is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00291                 T const range = tan(radians(fovy / T(2))) * zNear;      
00292 #endif
00293                 T left = -range * aspect;
00294                 T right = range * aspect;
00295                 T bottom = -range;
00296                 T top = range;
00297 
00298                 detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> Result(T(0));
00299                 Result[0][0] = (T(2) * zNear) / (right - left);
00300                 Result[1][1] = (T(2) * zNear) / (top - bottom);
00301                 Result[2][2] = - T(1);
00302                 Result[2][3] = - T(1);
00303                 Result[3][2] = - T(2) * zNear;
00304                 return Result;
00305         }

00307         // Infinite projection matrix: http://www.terathon.com/gdc07_lengyel.pdf
00308         template <typename T>
00309         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> tweakedInfinitePerspective
00310         (
00311                 T fovy,
00312                 T aspect,
00313                 T zNear,
00314                 T ep
00315         )
00316         {
00317 #ifdef GLM_FORCE_RADIANS
00318                 T range = tan(fovy / T(2)) * zNear;     
00319 #else
00320 #               pragma message("GLM: tweakedInfinitePerspective function taking degrees as a parameter is deprecated. #define GLM_FORCE_RADIANS before including GLM headers to remove this message.")
00321                 T range = tan(radians(fovy / T(2))) * zNear;    
00322 #endif
00323                 T left = -range * aspect;
00324                 T right = range * aspect;
00325                 T bottom = -range;
00326                 T top = range;
00327 
00328                 detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> Result(T(0));
00329                 Result[0][0] = (static_cast<T>(2) * zNear) / (right - left);
00330                 Result[1][1] = (static_cast<T>(2) * zNear) / (top - bottom);
00331                 Result[2][2] = ep - static_cast<T>(1);
00332                 Result[2][3] = static_cast<T>(-1);
00333                 Result[3][2] = (ep - static_cast<T>(2)) * zNear;
00334                 return Result;
00335         }
00336 
00337         template <typename T>
00338         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, defaultp> tweakedInfinitePerspective
00339         (
00340                 T fovy,
00341                 T aspect,
00342                 T zNear
00343         )
00344         {
00345                 return tweakedInfinitePerspective(fovy, aspect, zNear, epsilon<T>());
00346         }

00348         template <typename T, typename U, precision P>
00349         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> project
00350         (
00351                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & obj,
00352                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & model,
00353                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & proj,
00354                 detail::tvec4<U, P> const & viewport
00355         )
00356         {
00357                 detail::tvec4<T, P> tmp = detail::tvec4<T, P>(obj, T(1));
00358                 tmp = model * tmp;
00359                 tmp = proj * tmp;
00360 
00361                 tmp /= tmp.w;
00362                 tmp = tmp * T(0.5) + T(0.5);
00363                 tmp[0] = tmp[0] * T(viewport[2]) + T(viewport[0]);
00364                 tmp[1] = tmp[1] * T(viewport[3]) + T(viewport[1]);
00365 
00366                 return detail::tvec3<T, P>(tmp);
00367         }
00368 
00369         template <typename T, typename U, precision P>
00370         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, P> unProject
00371         (
00372                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & win,
00373                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & model,
00374                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & proj,
00375                 detail::tvec4<U, P> const & viewport
00376         )
00377         {
00378                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Inverse = inverse(proj * model);
00379 
00380                 detail::tvec4<T, P> tmp = detail::tvec4<T, P>(win, T(1));
00381                 tmp.x = (tmp.x - T(viewport[0])) / T(viewport[2]);
00382                 tmp.y = (tmp.y - T(viewport[1])) / T(viewport[3]);
00383                 tmp = tmp * T(2) - T(1);
00384 
00385                 detail::tvec4<T, P> obj = Inverse * tmp;
00386                 obj /= obj.w;
00387 
00388                 return detail::tvec3<T, P>(obj);
00389         }

00391         template <typename T, precision P, typename U>
00392         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> pickMatrix
00393         (
00394                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & center,
00395                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & delta,
00396                 detail::tvec4<U, P> const & viewport
00397         )
00398         {
00399                 assert(delta.x > T(0) && delta.y > T(0));
00400                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result(1.0f);
00401 
00402                 if(!(delta.x > T(0) && delta.y > T(0)))
00403                         return Result; // Error
00404 
00405                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Temp(
00406                         (T(viewport[2]) - T(2) * (center.x - T(viewport[0]))) / delta.x,
00407                         (T(viewport[3]) - T(2) * (center.y - T(viewport[1]))) / delta.y,
00408                         T(0));
00409 
00410                 // Translate and scale the picked region to the entire window
00411                 Result = translate(Result, Temp);
00412                 return scale(Result, detail::tvec3<T, P>(T(viewport[2]) / delta.x, T(viewport[3]) / delta.y, T(1)));
00413         }
00414 
00415         template <typename T, precision P>
00416         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> lookAt
00417         (
00418                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & eye,
00419                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & center,
00420                 detail::tvec3<T, P> const & up
00421         )
00422         {
00423                 detail::tvec3<T, P> f(normalize(center - eye));
00424                 detail::tvec3<T, P> s(normalize(cross(f, up)));
00425                 detail::tvec3<T, P> u(cross(s, f));
00426 
00427                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result(1);
00428                 Result[0][0] = s.x;
00429                 Result[1][0] = s.y;
00430                 Result[2][0] = s.z;
00431                 Result[0][1] = u.x;
00432                 Result[1][1] = u.y;
00433                 Result[2][1] = u.z;
00434                 Result[0][2] =-f.x;
00435                 Result[1][2] =-f.y;
00436                 Result[2][2] =-f.z;
00437                 Result[3][0] =-dot(s, eye);
00438                 Result[3][1] =-dot(u, eye);
00439                 Result[3][2] = dot(f, eye);
00440                 return Result;
00441         }
